result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert E Henderson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Robert E Henderson in court.  
Attorney Theodore OReilly in court for Robert E Henderson.  
Attorney Erika Strebel in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a Final Pretrial.
State  placed their Offer on the record  and rejected by Defense. Case remains in trial posture.
Court reviewed and addressed with the parties final pretrial documents. 
Court ordered case adjourned.  Jury Trial remains calendared for November 14, 2022 at 9:00am.
Received and filed: Defendant's Witness List.
Received and filed: DEFENDANT'S MOTION IN LIMINE.
Received and filed: DEFENDANT'S Proposed Jury Instructions.
Received and filed: STATE'S Requested Jury Instructions.
Received and filed: STATE'S MOTION IN LIMINE.
Received and filed: State's Witness List.

Attorney Theodore OReilly in court, defendant Robert E Henderson not in court, in custody.  
Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Case in court for a Scheduling Conference.Defense request a final pretrial and jury trial dates. 
Court ordered parties to file their Pretrial documents 48 hours in advance of the final pretrial hearing.
Case remains calendared in Branch 19. Parties advised this hearing will be held in person, room 313 of the courthouse.
  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Robert E Henderson in court with Attorney Theodore OReilly.  Defendant Robert E Henderson in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer S. Patrick. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.    
*Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04, parties are hereby notified that as of July 30, 2022, this case will be assigned to Branch 19, Judge Kori Ashley, in Room 313 of the Safety Building.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert E Henderson in court with Attorney Theodore OReilly; both appear by video.  Defendant Robert E Henderson in custody.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is on vacation. Defense moves to dismiss; denied.  Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Robert E Henderson in court with attorney Theodore OReilly.  Defendant Robert E Henderson in custody.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Robert E Henderson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kies, Branch 45. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Robert E Henderson
Current: 8922 W Villard Ave #1, Milwaukee, WI 53225   (Effective: 06-25-2022)
Prior: 9334 West Brown Deer Road # 3, Milwaukee, WI 53224
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
